message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'd be happy to pay $9,500 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $11,000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm able to go right now. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product, but I'm really at my limit. If that doesn't work, I might need to consider other options.

I understand you're at your limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,000 and $11,000, so I can offer it to you for $10,500. This is my final offer in this range.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is still a little more than I'm able to spend right now. I'm really hoping to get this done for $10,000. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement. Let's make it happen!

I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob, but I've already met you halfway and I'm not willing to go any lower than $10,500. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I can include a premium warranty and dedicated support for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500 with these added perks?

Alice, I appreciate the offer of the warranty and support, but I'm still focused on getting the best price on the product itself.  I'm really hoping to close this deal at $10,000. If you can meet me there, we'll finalize the deal, extras included. If not, I might need to explore other options.

I'm not willing to budge on the price, Bob. I've already offered you a great deal with the warranty and support, and I'm not willing to give it away for $10,000. My final offer is $10,750, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not interested, I'm happy to discuss with other buyers.
